title: bd sync fails when worktree already on main
description: Running 'bd sync' in /home/ben/source/queryops on branch main fails with: 'Error committing to sync branch: failed to create worktree: exit status 128; fatal: 'main' is already used by worktree at '/home/ben/source/queryops''. This prevents using bd sync in a single-worktree clone. Workaround: commit .beads files directly via git.
